author: federicov
content: What are the security issues related to the layer 2 application (over the less decentralization)? And if there're issues (for example a conflicting transaction) how can the Ethereum mainnet be safe and check all those blocks without losing part of its scalability?

author: odyslam
content: Thanks for that info! I didn't know, will def check them out

author: odyslam
content: Just to build on the previous message, their layer2 is actually an integration with Starkware,
